name: Full Control
description:
Full Control

Position yourself to dodge obstacles from all sides. Use your cannon to the enemies chasing you, but beware, you can't stop spinning so time your shots!

Controls

W/A/S/D - Move

SPACE - Fire

ESCAPE - Bring up menu

Credits
